steps.title: Access CardioServer
items: In Epic, open the patient chart → click the CardioServer SmartLink/URL.
OR on the desktop, double-click the CardioServer icon.
OR in Citrix Workspace → CardioServer → Open.
On the login page, enter AD username + password.
Confirm header shows Role = Tech User.

steps.title: Find & Filter Studies
items: Set Status filter: Preliminary / Unconfirmed / Confirmed / Stored.
Optional: set Date filter (Today, Last 7 Days, Custom).

steps.title: Link Study to Correct Patient & Order
items: Search MRN or Name → select patient.
If multiple orders show, select the correct order.
Click Save / Link → verify patient + order appear in header.

steps.title: Assign Study to Provider
items: Type provider name → select from list.
Click Save / Update → confirm provider shows in header.

steps.title: Trash & Restore Studies
items: Click More Actions → Move to Trash.
To restore (≤30 days): open Trash → select study → Restore / Untrash.

qa.q: What if a study doesn’t match any patient/order?
qa.a: Use Link/Reconcile → search MRN → select correct order.

qa.q: Can I trash a study that’s already Unconfirmed?
qa.a: No, only Preliminary studies can be trashed.

qa.q: How do I restore a deleted study?
qa.a: Go to Trash view → select study → Restore (within 30 days).

steps.title: Launch a Consult
items: In Epic, open the MPage 'TV Kit Consults' or go to the Converge website.

steps.title: Documentation
items: In Epic, open the Consult MPage.
Enter consult note → link to encounter → Sign.

qa.q: What if patient can’t hear me?
qa.a: Check mute, device volume, and TV Kit connection.

qa.q: Where do I document the visit?
qa.a: In Epic under the Consult MPage note linked to the encounter.

steps.title: Track Board Overview
items: Review columns for Bed, Name, Age, Complaint, Acuity, Staff initials.
Hover over initials for full staff names.

steps.title: Order Status Icons
items: Check columns showing EKG, Meds, Labs, Imaging.
Counts show Placed, In Process, Completed.

steps.title: Registration & Disposition
items: Registration column: ✔ = complete, X = incomplete (does not block discharge).

steps.title: Layout Customization
items: Move items (e.g., Suicide Risk) to preferred position.

steps.title: Views
items: Click magnifying glass for more info.

qa.q: What does an X in registration mean?
qa.a: Registration incomplete. It won’t block discharge.

qa.q: How do I see pending labs?
qa.a: Check order columns: Placed, In Process, Completed.

steps.title: Receiving & Processing
items: Add FYIs or cancel/redraw if needed.

qa.q: How do I reprint a specimen label?
qa.a: Open the Order → select Reprint Label.
